channel.title: Need Help, please help [718] thanks
channel.description: Hello everybody, I have a problem. You may also think that I'm stupid. How can I make myself an owner? I know it only from the character file. But from my source, you can not use the character file.I've tried it from many different ways but it does not work and I've also tried it from the player.java file. but it still will not work. And I have compiled, but it still will not work :/ Is there any other ways? be please to send them to me. Thank you.

item.title: Need Help, please help [718] thanks
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’ll have to set it when the player logs in. I think with 718 sources it’s in the Player class?

if (name.equalsIgnoreCase("name")) playerRights = 7;

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help, please help [718] thanks
item.dc:creator: @RuneGods RuneGods
item.description:
@RuneGods wrote:

Hello everybody, I have a problem. You may also think that I’m stupid. How can I make myself an owner? I know it only from the character file. But from my source, you can not use the character file.I’ve tried it from many different ways but it does not work and I’ve also tried it from the player.java file. but it still will not work.
And I have compiled, but it still will not work
Is there any other ways? be please to send them to me.
Thank you.

Read full topic
